ctx: intros f a b pr_f pr.
exceptions.tactic: pose (pr_neg := Riemann_integrable_opp f a b pr).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b The term "pr" has type "Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b" while it is expected to have type "Riemann_integrable f a b" (cannot unify "{phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (- f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}" and "{phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}").

original: intros f a b pr_f pr. pose (pr_neg := Riemann_integrable_opp f a b pr). rewrite (RiemannInt_minus f (fun x => - f x) a b pr_f pr_neg pr). rewrite RiemannInt_const. rewrite RiemannInt_const. rewrite RiemannInt_const. ring.
